abstract: Last year, Intel Capital, the venture capital arm of the giant chipmaker, invested in more U.S. deals than some of the biggest venture firms in Silicon Valley, including Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers and Sequoia Capital.
lead_paragraph: Last year, Intel Capital, the venture capital arm of the giant chipmaker, invested in more U.S. deals than some of the biggest venture firms in Silicon Valley, including Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers and Sequoia Capital.
